headline: Kroger Family of Companies Hiring 15,000 Associates for Roles that Enhance the Customer Experience
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR), America's grocer, today announced it is seeking to hire new associates for opportunities that enhance the customer experience in roles such as cashiers, baggers, deli bakery clerks, pharmacy technicians, Kroger delivery drivers and more.
